citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
An APHIS official reviewed two semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official (IO) at the time of inspection. The reports
were dated January 9, 2024, and July 1, 2024. Minor deficiencies were noted in the reports, arising from the facility
inspections conducted by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). However, these reports did not
include a specific plan and schedule for the correction of each deficiency identified. Failure to include a specific plan and
schedule for correcting deficiencies can cause delays in the correction of such deficiencies. The facility shall prepare
reports of the semi-annual review of the program of humane care and use of animals and inspection of the facilities. Any
departures from the Animal Welfare Act (AWA) must be described with a reason for the departure, a designation of minor
or significant, and a reasonable and specific plan and schedule with dates for correction. Correct by December 27, 2024,
with the next semi-annual report.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
